com.ikarus.solartaxi

Class EndOfGameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.ikarus.solartaxi.EndOfGameActivity

  • public class EndOfGameActivity
extends Activity
    Activity for SplashScreen when all levels have been completed or Taxi has crashed.
    Author:
    Nikolaus Leopold, Sebastian Kirchner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EndOfGameActivity() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBackPressed()
      Ensure you can't get back to Game from here by setting next activity manually
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Sets all ImageViews to Invisible and according to getExtras the corresponding Splashscreen is shown.

      Remove the Callback for correct behaviour if activity is skipped

      • EndOfGameActivity

    • Method Detail

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Ensure you can't get back to Game from here by setting next activity manually

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Sets all ImageViews to Invisible and according to getExtras the corresponding Splashscreen is shown. Implements a Handler so it terminates automatically after 4.5 seconds.

      • onDestroy

        protected void onDestroy()
        Remove the Callback for correct behaviour if activity is skipped

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Skip ahead on touch.
